channel.title: Crash when attacking
channel.description:
hello. [b]my friend has decided to make a server based from Zdiddy. i couldn't find a client.. so i decided to use; DDSspeced client (i think) whenever i attack a monster it gives me this message;[/b]
exception in thread "thread-4" java.lang.ArithmeticException: / by zero at client.method34 at client.method146 at client.method102 at client.method9 at Applet_Sub1.run at client.run at java.lang.Thread.run

item.title: Crash when attacking
item.dc:creator: @sinedscape sinedscape
item.description:
@sinedscape wrote:

i have to use a wholee new client? could you suggest one for me please? it took me about 3 hours to find that one.

Read full topic

item.title: Crash when attacking
item.dc:creator: @ollie123 Ollie123
item.description:
@ollie123 wrote:

[quote=“sinedscape, post:1, topic:265395”]hello.

[b]my friend has decided to make a server based from Zdiddy. i couldn’t find a client…
so i decided to use; DDSspeced client (i think)

whenever i attack a monster it gives me this message;[/b]

[quote]exception in thread “thread-4” java.lang.ArithmeticException: / by zero
at client.method34client.java:1338
at client.method146client.java:11982
at client.method102client.java:7706
at client.method9client.java:8656
at Applet_Sub1.run<Applet_Sub1.java:122>
at client.runclient.java:4392
at java.lang.Thread.run
[/quote][/quote]

There is an error (division by zero) in the client. Try another client.

Read full topic
